entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 late this evening then light before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
